definitions.definition: Emptiness, the absence of an intrinsic essence or nature which is stable and separable from other things.
Emptiness, in terms of a meditative state; an Eastern concept of a high meditative state of calm and freedom from distraction.

main_definition: ( Buddhism ) Emptiness, the absence of an intrinsic essence or nature which is stable and separable from other things.
secondary_definitions: ( psychology ) Emptiness, in terms of a meditative state; an Eastern concept of a high meditative state of calm and freedom from distraction.
